name: Crowd (Bédu Louis)
description:
CROWD! is a toy, in top view.

You control an avatar in a city populate by entities. You are able to use a pistol and various bonuses to fight your way through the crowd. You can choose to hunt them or not. As long as you dont take your gun out, people will behave peacefully and sometimes even block you and push you, but if they see your gun or hear a gunshot, they will run away from you as fast as they can. In the crowd, you'll notice a special entity, more fearful, try to shoot it to spice up the game... if you can!

_______________________________________________________________

VICTORY CONDITIONS:

  • None, it's not a game but a toy, you can't win or loose, there is no goal, just play for fun as long as you want! Enjoy!

BONUS:

  • If you manage to shoot a special entity, you will get a random power between Speed and Time, but be careful, he's scared of you, even if he dont see your gun!

_______________________________________________________________

CONTROLS (only keyboard and mouse):

  • ZQSD to move
  • MouseWheel to zoom in and out
  • RightClick to take your gun out
  • LeftClick to shoot (with gun out)
  • R to reload
  • E to use the Speed Power
  • A to use the Time Power

_______________________________________________________________

Made by Bédu Louis, Bon Alexandre, Deliens Thomas & Szulek Antonin, 4 students in Game Design at ICAN, Paris, in 4 months, when doing our second year of studies!
